title: How to make biology notes for the NEET - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A. Before reading: I would like to share you that my intention to tell you the best possible effective ways. I noticed thay so many notes which are available basically very fancy kind of thing. Nice diagrams with so many colours, nicely labelled, handwritten is extremely good and people are attacked too much. I love too. I have Up Votted for same but does it mean essentials. But, my humble and kind request to you… please Think and Rethink again and again… Why will be done?What's the cost in terms of time?Is there any alternative ways to make simple useful note and time to save?How to make precise?Really, will it be useful or just to satisfy you?Important Points to decide Keeping in mind as a overall aspects I have shared my simple formatted own notes… You to decide how do you will prepare yours. What to cover… For what notes to prepare Chapter wise all important pointsAll NCERT diagrams and other diagramsAll the Flow ChartsListing all exceptionsList of Name of the Person - Who Found First, Who Discovered, Who Gave Terminology, Father of….Differences and comparisonsMind Maps are very importantMention NCERT Page Number wherever possibleDo… Use only Black and Blue coloured pens while writing, See in Quora no coloured font is used… this is purposefully designed.Use combination of Small & Capital lettersProper formatting, paragraphs, bullet pointsNote books should be handyWhile revise, use Green, Red penBased on the importance - use 1 star, 2 stars, 3 starsLogically split the multiple notes into separate copiesKeep 20% white spaces while creating the notes. later to fill up during revision timeNCERT, Trueman’s biology are enough to use as Text booksEven you take the points from your Class Notes and Coaching Study MaterialsDon’t Do… So many coloured pens while writingEssay type, too much descriptiveAll of these notes for your success only; if you understand by going through the notes, well enough. You are not preparing those for others. Time is costly. Noticed many people spend time for making nice, beautiful notes. Strictly avoid.Taking too many reference books while making the notesNo need to get verified the notes you are preparing by any teacher, it’s just like your personal diary.MY UGLY POINT WISE NOTES - Crispy- Only for my understanding- Beauty is that I need max two hours times to revise…. ***Will update with different kinds of things … required…. taking example of my notes..
